name: Drop (NullBlastio)
description:
Drop is a midevil style rhythm game that I made for my thesis project in graduate school.The objective of the game has the player guiding a knight throughout various midevil settings.

Use your keyboard to hit notes as your character passes underneath them interact with npcs and objects in the world itself

Includes

  • 2.5D levels
  • Fast paced gameplay
  • 3 levels
  • In depth sounds and music

With more to come in the future....
